name: The Pantheon

quote: 'From the dome of St. Peter's one can see every notable object in Rome... He can see a panorama that is varied, extensive, beautiful to the eye, and more illustrious in history than any other in Europe.' - Mark Twain

quote: 'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings: Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!' - Percy Bysshe Shelley

name: Bolshoi Theatre
quote: 'Bolshoi Ballet is a universe of the imagination, a place of magic and enchantment, beauty and romance. Its many worlds vibrate with graceful dancers, glorious music, and sumptuous costumes.' - Trudy Garfunkel

name: Mont St.Michel
uniques: All newly-trained [Missionary] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
quote: 'Church and State, Soul and Body, God and Man, are all one at Mont Saint Michel, and the business of all is to fight, each in his own way, or to stand guard for each other.' - Henry Adams

name: St. Catherine Monastery
uniques: Must have an owned [Mountain] within [2] tiles
quote: 'The only place where one can go to experience the presence of God is Mount Sinai: here is where Moses received the tablets of the law, here is where the cloud rested on the Mount, here is where the fire spoke and the God of Israel was heard talking to Moses; the entire history of Israel begins at Sinai; if we seek to find God here in Sinai, what are we looking for? What we seek is the same God that Moses met on top of this mountain in the fire and the cloud. We are looking for the same God that spoke to Moses, the same God that led the people of Israel through the Red Sea and to the other side of the Jordan.' - Hans Küng

name: Buddha's Of Bamyan
quote: 'The destruction of the Bamyan Buddhas will not destroy the spirit of Buddhism - this will last forever. But the destruction of the statues will be a dark spot on the face of humanity and it is up to us to make sure that no more destruction happens.' - The Dalai Lama

name: Santa Maria Del Fiore
quote: 'Santa Maria del Fiore is a magnificent work of art. To see its dome, and stand within its vast interior is a humbling and moving experience. The scale and beauty of the building convey a sense of the sublime, and leave one in awe of what human beings can achieve when guided by a sense of purpose, and inspired by a vision of the divine.' - David Starkey

name: Santa Maria delle Grazie
uniques: Must have an owned [Mountain] within [2] tiles
quote: 'Santa Maria delle Grazie is a treasure trove of art and history. The church is steeped in tradition and has been a center of pilgrimage and devotion in Milan for centuries. The mural 'The Last Supper' is just one of the many works of art that can be found within its walls. I was moved by the beauty and power of the painting, and by the significance of its place within the broader history of Italy and the church.' - Michelle Obama

name: Wat Pho
quote: 'Wat Pho is an incredible example of the beauty and reverence of Buddhist architecture and art. The massive reclining Buddha statue is a true marvel of engineering and craftsmanship, and the temple itself is a true testament to the power of religious devotion. The experience of visiting Wat Pho was truly unforgettable, and I hope that others will have the opportunity to visit the temple and experience its beauty for themselves.' - Richard Branson
